ECONNREFUSED.title: The Selenium server could not be reached
ECONNREFUSED.help: You should start it up with a command like `java -jar selenium-server-standalone.jar`

BAD_CONFIG.title: An error occurred while executing the configuration file for this suite

NO_SCENARIOS.title: No scenario was found in this suite

EACCES.title: Some files in the given suite are not readable

SCENARIOS_NOT_FOUND.title: Some of the scenarios you specified were not found
SCENARIOS_NOT_FOUND.help: Double-check the path to your suite, and the numerical indices you specified
